com.google.api.client.googleapis.extensions.appengine.auth.helpers
Class AbstractGoogleAppAssertionServlet

java.lang.Object
  AbstractAppEngineTwoLeggedFlowServlet
      com.google.api.client.googleapis.extensions.appengine.auth.helpers.AbstractGoogleAppAssertionServlet
Deprecated. (scheduled to be removed in 1.8) Use AppIdentityCredential 

@Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractGoogleAppAssertionServlet
extends AbstractAppEngineTwoLeggedFlowServlet

Specialization of the two-legged auth servlet that assigns reasonable defaults for using the GoogleAppAssertionFlow to talk to Google APIs on App Engine.

Since:
1.5
Author:
moshenko@google.com (Jake Moshenko)
